title: Calligraphic battle - 'Gradus and Job Wouters write the alphabet'
content:
Just cropped up on Drawn ...

This errs to the side of sentimental, but it’s worth the four minutes, and I reckon some of you lot might enjoy it. Makes me want to get inky.

[http://drawn.ca/2008/04/28/gradus-and-job-wouters-write-the-alphabet/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040522/http:/drawn.ca/2008/04/28/gradus-and-job-wouters-write-the-alphabet/ "http://drawn.ca/2008/04/28/gradus-and-job-wouters-write-the-alphabet/")

 [‹ percent symbol usage in writing](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040522/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44788 "Go to previous forum topic") [Quartet Foundry ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905040522/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44662 "Go to next forum topic")
author: olho

comments.content: That was beautiful. I want to do that with my kids when I become a dad.
